item.title: Chef & Berkshelf - SSL Certificate Validation Error on Windows
item.description: When using Windows, Chef, Vagrant and Berkshelf, you may encounter an issue with certificate validation. The error you may encounter is as follows: Faraday::SSLError: SSL_connect returned=1 errno=0 state=SSLv3 read server certificate B: certificate verify failed The problem is Ruby is expecting the SSL_CERT_FILE environmental variable to be set. This should point to a CA bundle to use for SSL certificate validation. If this is not set, certificate validation will fail. You can adjust the Berkshelf configuration to not verify SSL certificates, but I have found this setting to be problematic and sporadically not work.
